name: OpenCorporates+Has Brands
title: Has Brands
question: What brands does this company own?
about: Brands are the customer facing version of companies. Sometimes a company will have several brands and might implement different principles and values that guide their operational decisions for each brand. As such it is helpful to understand how a company may operate differently depending on which customer group they are trying to serve.
